thread.title: Excellent Hotel - great location, great staff
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel - great location, great staff - Review of Hotel Duo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: martyn v v
title: Excellent Hotel - great location, great staff
text:
Stayed here for the 4th time and was again delighted I chose to stay here.
The hotel is in a fantastic location, close to Hotel de Ville metro and walking distance to where I was working.
One if the best things about this hotel? - the staff - they genuinely couldn't be more helpful or friendly and for me this makes the hotel really special.
I was unable to book through my usual method (booking.com) for a follow up visit this week, however when I mentioned this at reception, Agnese managed to find me a room (at a very good rate too) and confirmed everything.
Rooms are a good size for Paris, bathroom & toiletries are lovely - nothing negative to say at all.
Will definitely stay here again and 100% recommend this hotel.
Great rooms (for me) are 29, 28 and 65. Huge thanks to all for making my stays great.
